title: Premium Productivity Dashboard
description: A modern productivity dashboard built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It includes a Todo List, Daily Planner, Pomodoro timer, Daily Goals tracker, motivational quotes, theme toggle, optimized images, and smooth UI interactions.

title: Xpert Home Appliance Repair
description: A professional service website for home appliance repair built with a clean and responsive UI. It helps users quickly book repair services, explore available solutions, and contact technicians easily through a fast, user-friendly experience.

title: Gym Web Application
description: A modern and responsive gym web application built to showcase fitness services, pricing, and brand presence. The frontend features smooth navigation, clean UI, and a structured layout, with backend integration planned for forms, authentication, and data handling.

title: Modern Portfolio Website
description: A modern personal portfolio showcasing full-stack skills with a glassmorphism UI, smooth animations, dark/light theme toggle, and responsive design. Built to highlight projects, performance optimization, accessibility, and clean, scalable frontend architecture.
